TopicTitle: Langley Research Center Turns 100 this year

Articles.Content:
Langley has played a pivotal role in the aerospace industry ever since its establishment in 1917. Now, Langley is 100 years old and still continues to contribute to NASA and the world - that includes us, fans of a game that is based on the exploration and research of space and space technologies.

Without Langley, I feel like KSP would not exist, or if it did it would be a very different game.

I thank Langley Research and its staff because they've worked hard to fly us into the future.
